# Steps to reproduce
Right-click in any folder to show context menu.

# Expected behavior
Show icon for PowerShell 7-Preview in context menu.

# Actual behavior

PowerShell right-click context menu does not show correct icon for PowerShell 7-Preview.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34123660/78694395-30723100-78c2-11ea-9ff3-c5349df217e7.png)

The reason is that the assets folder is missing from the install folder.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34123660/78694556-77602680-78c2-11ea-8a87-0ce3576f9bd8.png)
